movie.title: The Hollow Child
movie.description_intro: Samantha has lived her whole life in different foster homes. Now living in a small town, she never feels like she quite fits in, even with her own current foster family who might adopt her, or the boy who follows her around doing her classwork. So, it's perhaps natural that she doesn't know what to do with a curious tagalong little sister named Olivia. One day, Sam callously ditches Olivia, who wanders off into the woods on her own and disappears.
movie.description_full: Samantha has lived her whole life in different foster homes. Now living in a small town, she never feels like she quite fits in, even with her own current foster family who might adopt her, or the boy who follows her around doing her classwork. So, it's perhaps natural that she doesn't know what to do with a curious tagalong little sister named Olivia. One day, Sam callously ditches Olivia, who wanders off into the woods on her own and disappears.

movies.title: Cat Ballou
movies.summary: Cat(herine) Ballou's family farm is being threatened by the railroad. She sends for Kid Shelleen, finding him to be the drunkest gunfighter in the west. When her father is killed by the rail road magnate's gunman, she vows to fight on. Shelleen manages to ride sideways in several scenes, while minstrels sing the ballad of Cat Ballou in between scenes.

movies.title: Menendez: The Day of the Lord
movies.title_english: Menendez: The Day of the Lord
movies.title_long: Menendez: The Day of the Lord (2020)
movies.summary: A retired priest hunted by his sins is pulled back into darkness when a friend begs him to help his possessed daughter.
movies.description_full: A retired priest hunted by his sins is pulled back into darkness when a friend begs him to help his possessed daughter.
movies.synopsis: A retired priest hunted by his sins is pulled back into darkness when a friend begs him to help his possessed daughter.

movies.title: Hickey & Boggs
movies.summary: Bill Cosby and Robert Culp ("I Spy") are united again as private eyes in this Walter Hill-scripted "film noir." Searching for a missing girl, they find themselves involved with vicious criminals and precipitating a string of deaths.
movies.description_full: Bill Cosby and Robert Culp ("I Spy") are united again as private eyes in this Walter Hill-scripted "film noir." Searching for a missing girl, they find themselves involved with vicious criminals and precipitating a string of deaths.

movies.title: The Next Big Thing
movies.summary: When Julian allows his deranged best friend Chuck to follow him around 24/7 with a camera, his whole world spirals out of control causing turmoil in his personal and professional life.
movies.description_full: When Julian allows his deranged best friend Chuck to follow him around 24/7 with a camera, his whole world spirals out of control causing turmoil in his personal and professional life.
